chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (x : A) (xs : list A), x :: xs = [x] ++ xs

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
dedup_not_in_cons : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> x :: dedup A_eq_dec xs = dedup A_eq_dec (x :: xs)
remove_not_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> remove A_eq_dec x xs = xs
app_cons_singleton_inv : forall (A : Type) (xs : list A) (y : A) (zs : list A) (w : A), xs ++ y :: zs = [w] -> xs = [] /\ y = w /\ zs = []
before_split : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x y : A), before x y l -> x <> y -> In x l -> In y l -> exists xs ys zs : list A, l = xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs
map_eq_inv : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (xs ys : list B), map f l = xs ++ ys -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ l2 /\ map f l1 = xs /\ map f l2 = ys
cons_cons_app : forall (A : Type) (x y : A), [x; y] = [x] ++ [y]
remove_partition : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A) (p : A) (ys : list A), remove A_eq_dec p (xs ++ p :: ys) = remove A_eq_dec p (xs ++ ys)
StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_async net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
StepDrop_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_drop net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_dup net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
dedup_partition : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A) (p : A) (ys xs' ys' : list A), dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ p :: ys) = xs' ++ p :: ys' -> remove A_eq_dec p (dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ ys)) = xs' ++ ys'
step_dup_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_dup_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_drop_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) -> (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := xs ++ ys; nwState := nwState net |} -> P net net' []) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_drop_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) -> (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := xs ++ ys; nwState := nwState net |} -> P net net' []) ->...-> P n n0 l
filter_dedup : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (pred : A -> bool) (xs : list A) (p : A) (ys : list A), pred p = false -> filter pred (dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ ys)) = filter pred (dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ p :: ys))
Inductive step_dup (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_dup net net' [] Arguments step_dup {P params} Arguments StepDup_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_dup {P params} _ [net' p] (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive step_drop (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepDrop_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_drop net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] Arguments step_drop {P params} Arguments StepDrop_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDrop_drop {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments StepDrop_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope
step_failure_sind : forall P : list name * network -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [ |- BaseParams] ?P : [ |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [ |- FailureParams ?P]
step_failure_ind : forall P : list name * network -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [ |- BaseParams] ?P : [ |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [ |- FailureParams ?P]
Inductive InA (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (x : A) : list A -> Prop := InA_cons_hd : forall (y : A) (l : list A), eqA x y -> SetoidList.InA eqA x (y :: l) | InA_cons_tl : forall (y : A) (l : list A), SetoidList.InA eqA x l -> SetoidList.InA eqA x (y :: l) Arguments SetoidList.InA [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments SetoidList.InA_cons_hd [A]%type_scope [eqA]%function_scope [x y] _%list_scope Arguments SetoidList.InA_cons_tl [A]%type_scope [eqA]%function_scope [x] _ [l]%list_scope
Inductive step_failure (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (params : FailureParams P) : step_relation (list name * network) (name * (input + list output)) := StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)] | StepFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (out : list output) (...
StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)] where ?P0 : [ |- BaseParams] ?P : [ |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [ |- FailureParams ?P]
remove_dedup_comm : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), remove A_eq_dec x (dedup A_eq_dec xs) = dedup A_eq_dec (remove A_eq_dec x xs)
app_comm_cons : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), a :: x ++ y = (a :: x) ++ y
concat_cons : forall (A : Type) (x : list A) (l : list (list A)), concat (x :: l) = x ++ concat l
in_split : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2
step_failure_disk_ops_sind : forall P : list do_name * do_network -> list do_name * do_network -> list (do_name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [ |- BaseParams] ?P : [ |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [ |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
step_failure_disk_ops_ind : forall P : list do_name * do_network -> list do_name * do_network -> list (do_name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [ |- BaseParams] ?P : [ |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [ |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
StepFailureDiskOp_deliver : forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (do_name * do_msg)), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (do_pDst p) failed -> do_net_handlers (do_pDst p) (do_pSrc p) (do_pBody p) (nwdoState net (do_pDst p)) = (ops, out, d, l) ->...-> step_failure_disk_ops (failed, net) (failed, net') [(do_pDst p, inr out)] where ?P0 : [ |- BaseParams] ?P : [ |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [ |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
Inductive step_failure_disk_ops (P0 : BaseParams) (P : DiskOpMultiParams P0) (disk_op_failure_params : DiskOpFailureParams P) : step_relation (list do_name * do_network) (do_name * (input + list output)) := StepFailureDiskOp_deliver : forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (do_name * do_msg)), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (do_pDst p) failed -> do_net_handlers (do_pDst p) (do_pSrc p) (do_pBody p) (nwdoState net (do_pDst p)) = (ops, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwdoPackets := do_send_packets (do_pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwdoState := update do_name_eq_dec (nwdoState net) (do_pDst p) d; nwdoDisk := update do_name...
map_partition : forall (A B : Type) (p : list B) (l : list A) (x : B) (p' : list B) (f : A -> B), map f l = p ++ x :: p' -> exists (ap : list A) (a : A) (ap' : list A), l = ap ++ a :: ap' /\ map f ap = p /\ f a = x /\ map f ap' = p'
SetoidList.InA_split : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A) (x : A), SetoidList.InA eqA x l -> exists (l1 : list A) (y : A) (l2 : list A), eqA x y /\ l = l1 ++ y :: l2
hd_error_tl_exists : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x : A), hd_error l = Some x -> exists tl : list A, l = x :: tl
app_inj_tail : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a b : A), x ++ [a] = y ++ [b] -> x = y /\ a = b
Inductive Desc (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := d_nil : Relation_Operators.Desc A leA [] | d_one : forall x : A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA [x] | d_conc : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ [y]) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ [y]) ++ [x]) Arguments Relation_Operators.Desc _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_one _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_conc _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _%list_scope
step_async_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_async_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
rev_app_distr : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A), rev (x ++ y) = rev y ++ rev x
map_cons : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : A) (l : list A), map f (x :: l) = f x :: map f l
